title: SCOMCHIC Women's Plus Size Long Sleeve Wrap V Neck Tie Waist A Line Mini Dress

Show Your Feminine: The plus size party dress's style is deep v neck long sleeve a line short dress, elegant and sexy. Together with the design of lantern sleeves and waist belt, there is a good effect of covering meat, showing your slim figure and feminine silhouette

Match: The highly anticipated long sleeve dress is the perfect piece for the festive season. Emerald green dress is easy to pair with sandals, heels, boots, sneakers or necklace, earrings, hats. High waist design not only can hide tummy and belly fat, but also can make your legs look longer visually
Occasions: The plus size wrap dress is suitable for party, cocktail, wedding, club, honeymoon, office, outdoor, date, holiday, banquet, vacation, daily wear and so on
Warm Tips: Machine wash in mild or cold water, hang or dry, and do not bleach. If you have any question about this plus size dress for wedding guest, please contact us,we will provide support for you
